author: Unity
description:
We’re excited to introduce Unity Lite, now in open beta.
A web-based, no-code editor that makes it easy for industry teams to build and share interactive 3D applications—fast. Import CAD, BIM, or 3D data and bring ideas to life in minutes.

Sign up for the beta: https://on.unity.com/UnityStudio

#Unitylite #MadeWithUnity
title: Unity Studio Teaser

author: Unity
description:
In this video we demonstrate  how to use Cinemachine to create a slow motion effect while keeping your real-time camera movement smooth.

Learn more: 
https://on.unity.com/cinemachine

Find more free Unity learn resources:
https://on.unity.com/learn
title: Unity Tip Tuesday: Cinemachine slow motion camera #UnityLearn #UnityTips #Unity3D #cinemachine
